name: Anger the Skies
rulesText: Deal 3 damage to all allies. [Class Bonus]: Deal 4 damage to all allies instead.
flavorText: Those beneath darkened clouds can do little once the raucous thundering begins.

name: Arcane Blast
rulesText: [Efficiency] Deal 11 damage to target champion.
flavorText: Manifesting such chaotic mana is only possible for those who are the pinnacle of magic.

name: Arcane Disposition
rulesText: [Flux] Draw 2 cards. {Class Bonus} Draw a card.
flavorText: Harnessing arcane power requires great finesse.

name: Arcane Sight
rulesText: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn. Draw a card.
flavorText: "If only you could see what I see, Lorraine. Even you might abandon the sword." - Rai Koki

name: Arcanist's Prism
rulesText: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw that many cards.
flavorText: "Such a curious thing. It seems as though it's alive." - Rai Koki

name: Avenger's Ring
rulesText: At the end of each turn, if two or more of your allies have died this turn, you may banish Avenger's Ring. If you do, draw a card.
flavorText: Even an ordinary ring may become a source of power with runic inscription.

name: Banner Knight
rulesText: {Class Bonus} {Level 2+} Other allies and weapons you control get +1 {ATTACK}.
flavorText: Standards raised behind capable leader often instill courage in those that march astride.

name: Barrier Servant
rulesText: [Intercept] [Remove 2 enlighten counters from your champion]: The next time damage would be dealt to Barrier Servant this turn, prevent that damage.
flavorText: "Do not worry. I will protect you."

name: Bauble of Empowerment
rulesText: [Banish Bauble of Empowerment]: Your Champion gets +2 levels until end of turn.
flavorText: Mages often store their excess mana into such crystals. If used by even a novice mage, one might mistake them as far greater.

name: Blitz Mage
flavorText: "Reckless mages. They should think before they act!" - Rai Koki

name: Careful Study
rulesText: [Efficiency] Put 5 [enlighten] counters on your champion.
flavorText: Only with knowledge is power nurtured.

name: Clarent, Sword of Peace
rulesText: {Class Bonus} [Remove a durability counter from Clarent]: Prevent the next 1 damage target action would deal to units you control.
flavorText: A magical sword that is disenchanted by bloodshed.

name: Commander's Blade
rulesText: {Class Bonus} [Enter Effect]: Up to one target ally you control +1 {ATTACK} until end of turn.
flavorText: An ornate and pristine sword used ceremoniously with great effect, though dull of edge.

name: Creative Shock
rulesText: Draw 2 cards, then discard a card. {Class Bonus} If a Fire card was discarded by Creative Shock, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it.
flavorText: Fire mages must tread carefully.

name: Crusader of Aesa
rulesText: {Class Bonus} [Intercept]
flavorText: Persistent, if little else.

name: Crux Sight
rulesText: [Spectral Shift] Draw a card.
flavorText: Sight beyond physical limits.

name: Disorienting Winds
rulesText: [Efficiency] Return target ally to their owner's hand. Draw a card.
flavorText: Not the best way to travel.

name: Dream Fairy
rulesText: [Stealth] [Enter Effect]: Target opponent banishes a card at random from their memory. When Dream Fairy dies, each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their memory.

name: Dungeon Guide
rulesText: [Enter Effect]: You may banish 2 cards from your memory at random. If you do, your champion levels up.

name: Endura, Sceptre of Ignition
rulesText: {REST}, [Remove an enlighten counter from your champion]: Deal 1 damage to target unit.
flavorText: Its spark glows vibrantly in colors rarely seen. Some say, its spark originates from a distant world, one that is far more ominous than here.

name: Esteemed Knight
flavorText: A knight errant whose reputation preceds him. Many have perished beneath his blade.

name: Favorable Winds
rulesText: Favorable Winds costs 1 less to activate for each resting ally you control. Allies you control +1 {ATTACK} and +1 {HEALTH} until end of turn.
flavorText: A sudden gust to turn the tide.

name: Fire Resonance Bauble
rulesText: Whenever an opponent activates a Fire card, you may banish Fire Resonance Bauble. If you do, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Captured perhaps, but never tamed. Its owner must always err on the side of caution.

name: Fireball
rulesText: {Class Bonus} This card costs 2 less to activate. Deal 1+[LV] damage to target unit.
flavorText: A basic fire spell. Deadly when mastered.

name: Focused Flames
rulesText: {Class Bonus} {Focus} This card costs 3 less to activate. Deal 4 damage to target ally.
flavorText: Little withstands such concentrated heat.

name: Honorable Vanguard
rulesText: [Intercept]
flavorText: "On the signal of smoke, we open the gates"

name: Hurricane Sweep
rulesText: {Class Bonus} [Efficiency] [Multi-Target]

name: Impassioned Tutor
rulesText: [Intercept] {REST}, [Banish a Fire card from your graveyard]: Your champion gains +1 level until end of turn.
flavorText: "Are you ready for your lesson?"

name: Inspiring Call
rulesText: This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn. Allies you control get +1 {ATTACK} and +2 {HEALTH} until the end of the turn.
flavorText: "When words don't reach them, lead by example" - Lorraine Allard

name: Library Witch
rulesText: [Intercept] When Library Witch dies, draw a card.
flavorText: The studious ones at the academy have little patience for distractions. However, they are willing to help those in need.

name: Life Essence Amulet
rulesText: Whenever an ally you control dies while it is not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavorText: An amulet that resonates with the loss of life. If is commonly used by commanders to detect when a soldier dies in enemy territory.

name: Lorraine, Blademaster
rulesText: [Lorraine Lineage] [Enter Effect]: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks gain +2 {ATTACK} and "When this attack destroys an ally, draw a card."
flavorText: "Home World swordistry is like a cheat"

name: Lorraine, Crux Knight
rulesText: [Lorraine Lineage] Lorraine's attacks gain +1 {ATTACK} for each Regalia weapon card in your banishment.
flavorText: "Majestic Spirit, answer my call!"

name: Lorraine, Wandering Warrior
rulesText: [Enter Effect]: Materialize a Weapon card from your material deck with a memory cost of 0.
flavorText: "Sleep did not honor me with its presence, so the night will be productive elsewhere."

name: Magus Disciple
rulesText: {Class Bonus} Your champion gets +1 level. When Magus Disciple dies, draw a card.
flavorText: "Harnesss mana! Divert it to the archmage!"

name: Mana Limiter
rulesText: You may not remove [enlighten] counters from your champion to pay for costs. [Banish Mana Limiter]: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has 6 or more [enlighten] counters on them.
flavorText: A valuable training tool for young students.

name: Peer Into Mana
rulesText: Put 2+[LV] [enlighten] counters on your champion.
flavorText: "Mana works all the same in this world. Maybe it's what connects all of this together." - Rai Koki

name: Power Overwhelming
rulesText: Remove any amount of [enlighten] counters from your champion. Your champion gets +1 level for each counter removed this way until end of turn.
flavorText: Power without semblance of subtlety. One would do well to discard notions of escaping unscathed when battling a full-fledged arcanist.

name: Prismatic Edge
rulesText: {Class Bonus} [Enter Effect]: Each player reveals all cards from their memory. If a Fire card was revealed, choose a unity and deal 3 damage to ut. If a Water card was revealed, draw a card. If a Wind card was revealed, target opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.

name: Purge in Flames
rulesText: [Efficiency] Deal 2 damage to all units besides your champion. [Class Bonus]: Deal 3 damage to those units instead.

name: Rai, Archmage
rulesText: [Rai Lineage] [Inherited Effect]: Whenever you activate your first Mage action card of each turn, put an [enlighten] counter on this champion.

name: Rai, Spellcrafter
rulesText: [Enter Effect]: Put 2 [enlighten] counters on Rai.
flavorText: "A new world means new exciting magic at my fingertips."

name: Rai, Storm Seer
rulesText: [Rai Lineage] {REST}, [Remove 5 enlighten counters from Rai]: Copy target activated action your control. You may change the targets of the copied action.

name: Savage Slash
rulesText: {Class Bonus} {Level 2+} Savage Slash gets +1 {ATTACK}.
flavorText: "There is no such thing as grace on a battlefield." - Lorraine Allard

name: Scry the Skies
rulesText: [Glimpse] 1+[LV]. Draw a card.
flavorText: The skies hold secrets only privy to the few versed in its signs.

name: Seer's Sword
rulesText: {Class Bonus} Whenever Seer's Sword is used for an attack, [glimpse] 1.
flavorText: Even simple enchantment grants great advantage.

name: Spellshield: Arcane
rulesText: {Class Bonus} This card costs 2 less to activate. The next time damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent that damage, then put amount of [enlighten] counters on your champion equal to the amount of damage prevented this way.

name: Spirit Blade: Ascension
rulesText: As an additional cost to activate this card, return a Sword regalia you control to your material deck. Materialize a Sword card from your material deck, ignoring its materialization costs.
flavorText: "Spirit and Sword bound in harmony." - Lorraine Allard

name: Spirit Blade: Dispersion
rulesText: Remove all durability counters from any amount of Sword weapons you control, and then banish them. Deal damage equal to the amount of durability counters removed this way split among any amount of target units.
flavorText: Spirits are faithful companions to the very end.

name: Spirit Blade: Ghost Strike
rulesText: [Spectral Shift] {Class Bonus} [Fast Attack]

name: Spirit Blade: Infusion
rulesText: This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has dealt damage with an attack this turn. Until end of turn, target Sword weapon gets +3 {ATTACK} and "Whenever an attack involving this weapon deals damage to a champion, draw a card."
flavorText: A spirited strike never dulls.

name: Spirit of Fire
rulesText: [Enter Effect]: Draw 6 cards. [Inherited Effect]: This champion is Fire element in addition to its other elements. Fire element is permanently enabled.

name: Spirit of Wind
rulesText: [Enter Effect]: Draw 6 cards. [Inherited Effect]: This champion is Wind element in addition to its other elements. Wind element is permanently enabled.

name: Spirit's Blessing
rulesText: As an additional cost to activate this card, return a Regalia you control to your material deck. Wake your champion. Draw a card.
flavorText: "With the Spirits' favor, my weapon is restored." - Lorraine Allard

name: Sudden Steel
rulesText: This card costs 1 less to activate for each Warrior ally you control. {Class Bonus} If Sudden Steel is intercepted, put it into your memory instead of the graveyard as it resolves.

name: Surveillance Stone
rulesText: When your opponent attacks with a unit, if it was the third time they've attacked with a unit this turn, you may banish Surveillance Stone. If you do, draw a card.
flavorText: A magical alarm device unsuitable for common homes. Indispensible for a palace treasury.

name: Tome of Knowledge
rulesText: {Class Bonus} Your champion gets +1 level. [Banish Tome of Knowledge]: Draw a card.
flavorText: Mana provided, a mage's book amplifies one's potential. Otherwise, it makes for good kindling.

name: Warrior's Longsword
rulesText: {Class Bonus} Warrior's Longsword gets +1 {ATTACK}.
flavorText: Warriors hold their lives within their two hands. Reliable weapons are needed to protect them.

name: Weaponsmith
rulesText: {Class Bonus} At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a durability counter on target Weapon you control.
flavorText: Forge-hardened masters fuel the heat of battle to the rhythms of hammers and anvils.

name: Wind Cutter
rulesText: {Class Bonus} Wind Cutter gets +1 {ATTACK}. Reveal a random card in your memory. If that card is a Wind element, put a Wind Cutter into your memory instead of the graveyard as it resolves.

name: Wind Resonance Bauble
rulesText: Whenever an opponent activates a Wind card, you may banish Wind Resonance Bauble. If you do, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: A spirit of wind sleeps within this artifact. Perhaps it will grant blessings once it wakes.
